heading: JEE Main – Gateway to Engineering Colleges in India
subHeading: Prepare for India’s premier engineering entrance exam conducted by the National Testing Agency (NTA).
quickIntro: Joint Entrance Examination (JEE) Main is a national-level entrance exam for admission to undergraduate engineering and architecture programs across India.

eligibilityCriteria.qualification: Passed or appearing in Class 12 or equivalent examination
eligibilityCriteria.subjectsRequired: Physics and Mathematics with Chemistry/Biology/Technical Vocational Subject
eligibilityCriteria.ageLimit: No age limit (subject to institute-specific rules)
eligibilityCriteria.attemptLimit: Maximum 3 consecutive years from Class 12 passing year

selectionProcess: All India Rank (AIR) based on best score of sessions
scoreUsage: Admission to NITs, IIITs, and CFTIs
